help.raw-text-tab: Choose your text choice. Raw is normal text. Scoreboard pulls a value from the scoreboard. Selector pulls the name of an entity.
help.report-an-issue: Click here to report an issue. If you experience any sort of bug, you should report it here.
help.dropdown-list: Tweet, view the changelog, view the minecraft forums thread, or get resources for translation.
help.addsnippet: Add text to your tellraw command.
help.delete-all-saves: Clear your saves, but leave your current command in the main editor intact.
help.create-new-save: Make a new save. This will overwrite an existing save by the same name, if you so choose.
help.delete-all-snippets: Clear your command completely, but leave your saves intact.
help.show-saves: Show your saves editor, allows saving, loading, and deletion of saves.

saves.persistencenotice: Saves may reset at any time, and depend on your browsers cookies. Do not rely on them for extended periods of time.

deleteall.body: Clicking Delete will remove all your saves, but won't affect your current text
deleteall.heading: Are you sure!?!

deleteall.body: Clicking Delete will remove all your text and reset it to an empty string.
deleteall.heading: Are you sure!?!

importtext.default: Please enter the tellraw command. Use the Delete All button if it incorrectly imports. Import only works with /tellraw commands
importtext.exported: Please enter the string you were given when you exported your command

player.description: Used to select and execute different players

commandblock: You must run this in the server console or in a command block.

alert.changed: This page was recently modified, so there might be problems. Reload the page if something doesn't seem to work.

attribution: While nothing is required to use this, it would always be appreciated if you linked to this webpage or the MCF thread.
